job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's Degree required. Preferably in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.

jd: From: Deepika Dua, Stellar Consulting Solutions LLC deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com Reply to: deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.com Hi My name is Deepika & I am a recruiter at Stellar Consulting, and I came across your profile while looking for qualified candidates for a Technical Project Manager role. I was impressed by your experience and skills . I think you would be a great fit for this role, as you have almost all the skills & experience required for the role. Below are the job details for your reference. Job Title : Technical Project ManagerLocation : Atlanta, GA(Remote)Duration : Long term contractManifacturing is MustJob Summary:Responsibilities: Define the scope of the project in collaboration with senior management / Client Create a detailed work plan which identifies and sequences the activities needed to successfully complete the project Bachelor's/ Master’s degree in Engineering/Technology; PMP certified, if possible Experience in managing midland large IT projects Change management Strong leadership capabilities Strong written and verbal communications skills especially client level communications Relationship building/Influencing skills Qualifications we seek in you! Minimum qualifications: Bachelor's Degree required. Preferably in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field. Management skills (MBA etc.) IT Industry knowledge Project management background Relevant experience in IT industry Deepika DuaSr. Technical Recruiter at Stellar Consulting Solutions, LLCPhone: +1 678-935-7075Email: deepika.dua@stellarconsulting.comLinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/deepika-dua-018459166/
